title: 820-3662 on power
820-3662 on power
message:
ALL_SYS_PWRGD pulsing, but PPBUS_G3H 5V steady?

10 ohm doesn't look bad, but you should compare with similar board.

Check/replace C7125.
What is R7120 voltage?

title: 820-3662 on power
message:
I replaced the isl6295 and the SMC removed from the 820-00163 board, in tests at PPbus 12.3V
I wonder if the SMC board 820-3332 works on board 820-3662 ?
